attributes.action: Increase the legal age for purchasing of and drinking alcohol to 21 years of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to increase the legal age of purchasing and drinking of alcohol to 21 years of age. To minimise the damaging effects of alcohol on young peoples health including long term liver  damage and other serious long term mental health problems. As well as minimising the effects of alcohol crime related incidents on local community neighbourhoods

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
